Rich Maritime Data

Export hourly position data, Flag and Class data, trading histories, destination ports and sea time at your fingertips.

1.4 Billion Data Points

A detailed view of every IMO registered vessel in the world over a rolling 3-year period.

Bring your own data

Add your data for your own private, exclusive use and filter this how you want to see your results.
